name: Saphichay
description:
You find yourself being the only source of light, everything else is swallowed by darkness. Explore the last and most bitter memories of those who once roamed this world in ruins.

Saphichay is a 2D puzzle game, in which your objective is to guide a firefly to the origin of the roots in order to shine your light and uncover the art piece.

Use your mouse, or RS on a controller, to guide the firefly.
